title: VACCINATION Synonyms: 2 Synonyms & Antonyms for VACCINATION | Thesaurus.com
description: Find 2 ways to say VACCINATION, along with antonyms, related words, and example sentences at Thesaurus.com, the world's most trusted free thesaurus.
